Summary: Ball of fire, coming very fast, turned quickly in other direction disappearing slowly
divs: Sighting DetailsMy mom & I exited her front door of her home and in the sky to the left we both seen a ball of orange yellow light getting larger and traveling fast. It then took a pretty sharp turn and continued but slower to leave. We did not get a close look at it but we are positive it was not a plane. It had no blinking lights but rather a ball of fire look. My step dad was called out front but by that time it had changed direction and he said "it's just a plane". Our feelings were we both had never seen anything like it before and just knew it was not a plane.
